summary: A guide to customizing deep agents by configuring core components like models, system prompts, tools, and advanced features such as subagents and interrupts.

structure.title: Customize Deep Agents
structure.summary: Guide to customizing deep agents by configuring core components like model, system prompt, tools, and features such as subagents and interrupts.

nodes.title: Model
nodes.summary: Explains how to customize the model used by deepagents, either via a model identifier string or a LangChain model object.

nodes.path: customization > Customize Deep Agents > System prompt
nodes.title: System prompt
nodes.summary: Deep agents have a default system prompt for planning and tools, but custom prompts are needed for specific use cases, as shown in a research agent example.

nodes.title: Tools
nodes.summary: Describes how to provide custom tools to deep agents and lists default tools available, including file operations and task management.
